forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High -1C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 29F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 8 to 12 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix this evening will change to a rain and snow mix overnight. Low -2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of winter precipitation this evening. Then snow mixing with rain at times overnight. Low 27F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow and ice accumulations around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will mix with rain at times overnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low -3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the morning, otherwise a good deal of clouds. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the morning, otherwise a good deal of clouds. High 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low near 20F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. Low 17F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A light wintry mix. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of light winter precipitation. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix in the morning will transition to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of wintry precipitation that is most likely in the afternoon. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow and ice expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light freezing rain in the evening...later mixing with rain. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain and freezing rain. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
